lyrics:
5 contributorssunshine lyricsintro natalie stewart
you know sometimes we um
we dont recognize our dreams inside our reality
and other times were not aware of exactly whats real
you know we walk around daydreamin
but the sunshine the sunshine always is
and i

chorus marsha ambrosius natalie stewart both
i just wanna see my lovely sunshine sunshine remember
i just wanna bring back all of my blue skies blue skies
and if you take away my rainbow i will cry cry cry cry
give me back my sunshine

verse 1 marsha ambrosius natalie stewart
dreaming in my state of being
and i see you smiling so happy smiling
just laughing and standing strong
im missing you right here
listen to my tears
im waking up to skies so gray
im needing you to brighten up my day okay

verse 2 natalie stewart marsha ambrosius
listen
catch your breath cool out you need to calm down
lets concentrate dont go making all your time run out
see youre okay it looks much worse than it really is
and youll pull through
come on you know how we be doing this
its me and you
yo you promised you cant pull out now
were friends for life so you cant just sell me out
we shared a lot but you know well see just so much more
our wedding day and the children that we prayed for
you might also likechorus marsha ambrosius natalie stewart both
i just wanna see my lovely sunshine sunshine yeah sunshine
i just wanna bring back all of my blue skies blue skies
and if you take away my rainbow i will cry cry i will cry cry cry
give me back my sunshine

verse 3 marsha ambrosius natalie stewart
i used to depend on your eyes your eyes
to show me the way that i should go
my reality is blurry im afraid of being all alone im afraid of being alone
your light has been my guide throughout the good and bad
i wish that i had spent a little more attention to
my one and only sunshine listen listen

verse 4 natalie stewart
ill never leave you yo i swear that on my grave
damn whats that im feeling dizzy kinda getting faint
it aint nothin didnt sleep that much last night
from watching over you but no nurse im cool im fine
i said im feeling fine so back up off me im alright
im here to see my friends
yo whats up with that blinding light whats up with that
said i dont need to lay down i dont need your help right now whats up with all the noises all the running round
youve got it wrong im not the one who needs the helpin here yo whats up with you youre crying i see tears
yo whats going on dont leave please dont take her out
said i dont understand im kind of feeling scared now
i said its getting hard to breathe getting hard to see
im not too sure anymore whats going on with me
please bring her back and let me talk just one more time
but its too late the last exhale is mine
sunshine yeah
chorus marsha ambrosius natalie stewart both
i just wanna see my lovely sunshine sunshine yeah sunshine
i just wanna bring back all of my blue skies blue skies
and if you take away my rainbow i will cry cry i will cry cry cry
give me back my sunshine
i just wanna see my lovely sunshine lovely sunshine yeah
i just wanna bring back all of my blue skies
and if you take away my rainbow i will cry cry cry cry
give me back my sunshine2embed
